DOC.brief_summary: A randomized clinical trial check antipyretic efficacy oral intravenous paracetamol intramuscular diclofenac sodium patient present fever emergency department .
DOC.brief_title: The Antipyretic Efficacy Oral Intravenous Paracetamol Intramuscular Diclofenac Patients Presenting With Fever .
DOC.criteria: Adults age 1475 year oral temperature 38.5 C History allergy drug study Had take antipyretic within 8 hour Renal , hepatic haematological disorder bronchial asthma , peptic ulcer disease , vomit Pregnant lactating woman
